options.title: -0, --null
options.description: end each output line with NUL, not newline

options.title: -0, --null
options.description: end each output line with NUL, not newline

options.title: -S, --split-string=S
options.description:
process and split S into separate arguments; used to pass multiple
      arguments on shebang lines

options.description:
process and split S into separate arguments; used to pass multiple

options.title: --block-signal[=SIG]
options.description: block delivery of SIG signal(s) to COMMAND

options.title: --default-signal[=SIG]
options.description: reset handling of SIG signal(s) to the default

options.title: --ignore-signal[=SIG]
options.description: set handling of SIG signal(s) to do nothing

options.title: --list-signal-handling
options.description: list non default signal handling to stderr

options.title: -v, --debug
options.description: print verbose information for each processing step
